statements: SELECT * FROM plant_data;
SELECT plant_name, growth_rate FROM plant_data ORDER BY plant_id DESC;
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, growth_rate FROM plant_data WHERE growth_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM plant_data WHERE pollutant_removal_rate IS NULL;
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, growth_rate, pollutant_removal_rate FROM plant_data ORDER BY pollutant_removal_rate ASC, growth_rate DESC;
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, growth_rate, pollutant_removal_rate FROM plant_data WHERE plant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM plant_data WHERE growth_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY plant_name DESC;
SELECT plant_name, pollutant_removal_rate FROM plant_data WHERE growth_rate < 0.4 AND pollutant_removal_rate > 0.6;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_plants, AVG(growth_rate) AS average_growth_rate FROM plant_data;
SELECT plant_name, growth_rate FROM plant_data WHERE pollutant_removal_rate IS NULL ORDER BY plant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PlantGrowthData WHERE plant_id = 1;
SELECT height, width FROM PlantGrowthData WHERE height > 10 ORDER BY width DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlantGrowthData WHERE growth_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT plant_id, height, width FROM PlantGrowthData WHERE width < 5 AND height > 2 ORDER BY plant_id ASC;
SELECT project_id, AVG(removal_rate) AS average_removal_rate FROM PollutantRemovalRates GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT * FROM PlantGrowthData WHERE plant_id = 3;
SELECT project_id, growth_date, height FROM PlantGrowthData WHERE height > 10 ORDER BY growth_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, AVG(removal_rate) AS avg_removal_rate FROM PollutantRemovalRates GROUP BY project_id HAVING avg_removal_rate > 0.5;
SELECT project_id, SUM(height) AS total_height, AVG(width) AS avg_width FROM PlantGrowthData GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_height > 50;
SELECT plant_id, growth_date, height, width FROM PlantGrowthData WHERE growth_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM plant_growth_data;
SELECT plant_name, growth_rate FROM plant_growth_data ORDER BY growth_rate DESC;
SELECT plant_name, growth_rate FROM plant_growth_data WHERE growth_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM pollutant_removal_rates WHERE pollutant_type = 'CO2';
SELECT project_name, project_start_date FROM project_success ORDER BY project_start_date ASC;
SELECT plant_name, growth_rate FROM plant_growth_data WHERE plant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM plant_growth_data WHERE growth_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY growth_rate DESC;
SELECT project_name, success_score FROM project_success ORDER BY project_start_date;
SELECT plant_name, growth_rate, date_recorded FROM plant_growth_data WHERE growth_rate < 0.3;
SELECT * FROM pollutant_removal_rates WHERE pollutant_type = 'CO2' AND removal_rate > 0.7;
SELECT * FROM PlantData;
SELECT plant_name, growth_rate, growth_date FROM PlantData WHERE growth_rate > 0.5;
SELECT project_name, project_location, start_date, end_date FROM ProjectData ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT p.pollutant_name, p.pollutant_type, pd.safe_limit FROM PollutantData p JOIN PlantData pd ON p.pollutant_id = pd.plant_id;
SELECT pp.project_id, pp.plant_id, pd.plant_name, p.project_name FROM ProjectPlantMapping pp JOIN PlantData pd ON pp.plant_id = pd.plant_id JOIN ProjectData p ON pp.project_id = p.project_id;
SELECT * FROM PlantData WHERE growth_rate > 0.5 AND pollutant_removed = 'CO2';
SELECT plant_name, growth_rate, growth_date FROM PlantData ORDER BY growth_rate DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM ProjectData WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT p.project_name, pd.plant_name, pd.growth_rate FROM ProjectData p JOIN ProjectPlantMapping ppm ON p.project_id = ppm.project_id JOIN PlantData pd ON ppm.plant_id = pd.plant_id;
SELECT * FROM PlantData WHERE plant_id IN (SELECT plant_id FROM ProjectPlantMapping WHERE project_id = 101);
SELECT * FROM PlantGrowthData ORDER BY species_name ASC, start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT plant_id, growth_rate FROM PlantGrowthData WHERE growth_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY growth_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProjectDetails WHERE location = 'Garden' AND end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, location FROM ProjectDetails WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT common_name, scientific_name FROM PlantSpecies WHERE species_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT project_name, location FROM ProjectDetails;
SELECT species_name, growth_rate FROM PlantGrowthData ORDER BY growth_rate DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ProjectDetails WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT common_name, scientific_name FROM PlantSpecies WHERE species_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT participant_name, role, project_name FROM ProjectParticipants JOIN ProjectDetails ON ProjectParticipants.project_id = ProjectDetails.project_id;
